channel.title: Home on The Cliffs at Waterford Spring Lake, NC
channel.description: Recent content in Home on The Cliffs at Waterford Spring Lake, NC

item.title: Apply
item.description: Apply below for available units at The Cliffs at Waterford: When applying to rent at The Cliffs at Waterford please be prepared to provide: Social Security Card Driver’s License or other Government Photo ID Proof of Employment and your 2 most recent Paystubs Non-refundable Applicant fee via Credit or Debit Card A separate application is required for each potential resident over the age of 17

item.title: Floor Plans
item.description: 2 Bedroom - 2 Bathroom 2 Bedroom - 2.5 Bathroom 3 Bedroom - 2 Bathroom Each residence at The Cliffs has its own front door for maximum privacy and convenience, so you will never have to walk down a long corridor. View Current Availability Virtual Tour
